data.message: Trump supporters are a few braincells short of what would be considered a working mind, that's combined... I mean damn, there's a man out there with half a brain, and he's smarter than them.

replies.message: What was that? If you're trying to insult people, try making a little sense.

I just find it it really funny. If trump supporters ever attacked Hillary or Hillary supporters the way they insult trump supporters, it would be the end of the world. People forget that their words show their character.
We could’ve had Bernie, but he was done dirty by team Pedo.. And Now we Surely know why all those Hollywood pedos didn’t want Trump as President..

Peter, and Mike, what's the matter, can't wrap your minds round it?

Incapable of understanding something simple?
